already prepares me for the meeting. The
way it used to work, you know, I'd get
like five people from the account. We
schedule like a premeating briefing.
They prepare a document with all the
questions and it's probably like five
hours of some highly paid people. Now,
it's 30 seconds, right? It just means
it's read. If I have a question, I ask.

the potential is like uh uh way bigger
if you remember like 75% of of sellers

opportunity
size. Hi and welcome to training data.
Today we're excited to welcome Amit
Bendov, CEO and founder of Gong, which
is one of the most beloved companies in
the modern-day sales world and also one
of the very first AI native application

Gong's evolution from a wedge into a
platform, specifically from a
transcription tool into a broader
revenue intelligence platform and heard
more from Amit on his prediction for
what the sales team of the future might
look like and Gong's role in building
that future. Enjoy the show.
Amit, thank you so much for joining us
today. We are delighted to have you on

company in the sales world and so
looking forward to having you on
training data. I'm excited to be here.
Let's jump right in. I want to start

no, not in the near future. not not with

not binary like uh but short answer not
in the next like few years. Definitely
not if it's a complex outbound SDRs AI

Uh the role of the software we we're try
we're starting to understand the role of
